page.shortlink: api client api string insertfragment method

argument.name: instance
argument.description: The zero base index of the location to insert the fragment.

argument.name: separator
argument.description: The string or regular expression to use as the boundary of the fragments. An array of two strings and/or regular expressions can be passed in to define a separate start and end boundary.

return.name: value
return.description: The new string with the fragment inserted.

page.description: Extension to the native string variable to support insertion of fragments into a string.

discussion.p: The String.insertFragment method can be used to insert fragments of text into a string.
The "instance" argument is the index of the location where the fragment is to be inserted.
The optional "separator" argument is the string(s) and/or regular expression(s) to use as the boundaries of the fragments. By default the separators are white-space and punctuation characters.
